\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{in} } }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{out} } }  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{tuple}}}

\newcommand{\ottpctx}{
\ottrulehead{{ \mathit{ctx}_\mathit{P} }}{::=}{\ottcom{parser context}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  P  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{tuple}}}

\newcommand{\ottcctx}{
\ottrulehead{{ \mathit{ctx}_\mathit{C} }}{::=}{\ottcom{control context}}\ottprodnewline

         \implies  \gamma (x) = 
	   \begin{cases}
	     (\mathrm{lookup_v}( \varepsilon , e), e) & \mathrm{if} \; d \in \{ \uparrow , \updownarrow \} \\

\newcommand{\otteXXstmtXXsem}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{e\_stmt\_sem}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [  \ottnt{e}  ]  s  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{e'}  ]  s' }{}{}{}{\ottcom{expression semantics}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  s  \rightarrow [  \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  s' }{}{}{}{\ottcom{statement semantics}}}

\newcommand{\ottparsXXsem}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{pars\_sem}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ { \mathit{ctx}_\mathit{P} }  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  s  {\longrightarrow}_{p} [  \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  s' }{}{}{}{\ottcom{parser block semantics}}}

\newcommand{\ottctrlXXsem}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{ctrl\_sem}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ { \mathit{ctx}_\mathit{C} }  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  s  {\longrightarrow}_{c} [  \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  s' }{}{}{}{\ottcom{control block semantics}}}

\newcommand{\ottarchXXsem}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{arch\_sem}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ { \mathit{ctx}_\mathit{A} }  \vdash [  \ottnt{arch\_stmt}  ] (  { \mathit{env}_\mathit{A} } ,  { C } ,  \sigma ,  t  ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} [  \ottnt{arch\_stmt'}  ] (  { \mathit{env}_\mathit{A} }' ,  { C }' ,  \sigma' ,  t'  ) }{}{}{}{\ottcom{architecture-level semantics}}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXlookup}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{v}  = \mathrm{lookup_v} ( \varepsilon ,  x ) }%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [  \ottkw{var} \, x  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{v}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{e\_lookup}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXfuncXXcallXXnewframe}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  F  \ottsym{(}  f  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ \forall d ,\, e ,\, i \leqslant n. \, d =  \ottsym{[}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{]}  [i] \, \land \, e =  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  [i] \, \implies  
         ((d \in \{\circ , \downarrow\} \implies \mathrm{is\_const} \, e ) \land (d \in \{\updownarrow , \uparrow\} \implies \mathrm{is\_var} \, e)) }%
\ottpremise{ \forall d,\, e,\, x,\, i \leqslant n . \, x = [x_1 , ... , x_n] [i] \land 
         \, e = [e_1 , ... , e_n] [i] \land 
         \, d = [d_1 , ... , d_n] [i] 
         \implies  \gamma' (x) = 
	   \begin{cases}
	     (\mathrm{lookup_v}( \varepsilon , e), e) & \mathrm{if} \; d \in \{ \uparrow , \updownarrow \} \\
             (e, \bot) & \mathrm{if} \; d \in \{ \downarrow , \circ \}
	   \end{cases} }%
\ottpremise{ { \gamma }_G   \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\varepsilon'  \ottsym{=}   \ottsym{[}   { \gamma }_G   \ottsym{]}  \mathrel{\mathop+}+  \ottsym{[}  \gamma'  \ottsym{]} }%
\ottpremise{\varepsilon''  \ottsym{=}   \mathrm{tl} ( \varepsilon ) }%
\ottpremise{E'  \ottsym{=}   ( \varepsilon'' ,   f  ) ::  E }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{Tb} }  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottkw{call} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottkw{exec} \, \ottnt{stmt}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{,}  E'  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{e\_func\_call\_newframe}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXfuncXXexec}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{not\_empty} \, \ottnt{stmt}}%
\ottpremise{ \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow [  \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)} }%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [  \ottkw{exec} \, \ottnt{stmt}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottkw{exec} \, \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{e\_func\_exec}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXfuncXXexecXXempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [  \ottkw{exec} \,  \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottkw{exec} \, \ottkw{return} \, \ottkw{bot}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{e\_func\_exec\_empty}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXfuncXXret}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ ( \varepsilon' ,   f  ) ::  E'   \ottsym{=}  E}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  F  \ottsym{(}  f  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ { \gamma }_G   \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\varepsilon''  \ottsym{=}   \ottsym{(}   { \gamma }_G   \ottsym{)}  ::  \varepsilon' }%
\ottpremise{ \varepsilon'''  = \mathrm{FOLD} (\lambda \, \overline{\varepsilon} \, i . \,
	                  \mathrm{if}   \ottsym{[}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{]}  [i] \in \{ \downarrow , \circ \} \, \mathrm{then} \, \overline{\varepsilon} \\
                          \mathrm{else} \, \overline{\varepsilon} \, [a \longmapsto v] \mathit{where} \; (\mathit{v}, a) = \mathrm{lookup_t}(  \varepsilon  , [x_1 , ... , x_n] [i]) ) (  \varepsilon''  ) [1 ... n] }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{Tb} }  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottkw{exec} \, \ottkw{return} \, \ottnt{v}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{v}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'''  \ottsym{,}  E'  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{e\_func\_ret}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXfuncXXretXXseq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ ( \varepsilon' ,   f  ) ::  E'   \ottsym{=}  E}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  F  \ottsym{(}  f  \ottsym{)}}%

\ottpremise{\varepsilon''  \ottsym{=}   \ottsym{(}   { \gamma }_G   \ottsym{)}  ::  \varepsilon' }%
\ottpremise{ \varepsilon'''  = \mathrm{FOLD} (\lambda \, \overline{\varepsilon} \, i . \,
	                  \mathrm{if}   \ottsym{[}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{]}  [i] \in \{ \downarrow , \circ \} \, \mathrm{then} \, \overline{\varepsilon} \\
                          \mathrm{else} \, \overline{\varepsilon} \, [a \longmapsto v] \mathit{where} \; (\mathit{v}, a) = \mathrm{lookup_t}(  \varepsilon  , [x_1 , ... , x_n] [i]) ) (  \varepsilon''  ) [1 ... n] }%

 \ottsym{(}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{Tb} }  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottkw{exec} \, \ottkw{return} \, \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{v}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'''  \ottsym{,}  E'  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)} }{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXfuncXXcallXXargs}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  F  \ottsym{(}  f  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ i = \mathrm{min} \, \{ j . \,\,  \ottsym{[}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{]}  [j]  \in \{\circ , \downarrow\} \wedge \neg ( \mathrm{is\_const} \,  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  [j] ) \} }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{=}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  i  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{(}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{Tb} }  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottnt{e}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{e'}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  t'  \ottsym{)} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  =   ( i  \mapsto   \ottnt{e'} )  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  { \mathit{Tb} }  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottkw{call} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottkw{call} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  t'  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{e\_func\_call\_args}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleeXXaccXXargOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [  \ottnt{e}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{e'}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  t'  \ottsym{)} }%

 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [  \ottkw{select} \, \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;} \, ... \, \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{:}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{\}}  x  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottkw{select} \, \ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;} \, ... \, \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{:}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{\}}  x  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  t'  \ottsym{)} }{%

%% defn stmt_red
\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXassXXv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \varepsilon'  =  \varepsilon  [  \ottnt{lval}  \longmapsto  \ottnt{v}  ] }%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [   \ottnt{lval}  \mathrel{\mathop:}=  \ottnt{v}   ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow [   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_ass\_v}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXassXXnull}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [   \ottkw{null}  \mathrel{\mathop:}=  \ottnt{v}   ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow [   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_ass\_null}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXseqOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow [  \ottnt{stmt'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)} }%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{stmt_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow [  \ottnt{stmt'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{stmt_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)} }{%

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXseqTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXcondTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

{\ottdrulename{stmt\_cond3}}{}%

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXdecl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ i  = length ( \varepsilon ) - 1 }%
\ottpremise{\gamma  \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  i  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{v}  = \mathrm{arb\_from\_t}  t }%
\ottpremise{\varepsilon'  \ottsym{=}   ( i  \mapsto   ( x  \mapsto   \ottnt{v} )  \gamma  )  \varepsilon }%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [  \ottkw{decl} \, x \, t  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow [   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_decl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXblockXXenter}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [   \{  \ottnt{stmt}  \}   ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow [   [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]   ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_block\_enter}}{}%

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXblockXXexec}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow [  \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  t'  \ottsym{)} }%
}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [   [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]   ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow [   [  \ottnt{stmt'}  ]   ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  t'  \ottsym{)} }{%

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXblockXXexit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

}{
 \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [   [   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ]   ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow [   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_block\_exit}}{}%

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXverifyXXThree}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXverifyXXFour}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

{\ottdrulename{stmt\_verify\_4}}{}%

\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXapplyXXtableXXv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleparsXXstmt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ t  \neq \mathit{pars\_fin} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{(}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{empty}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  s  \rightarrow [  \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  s' }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  P  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  s  {\longrightarrow}_{p} [  \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  s' }{%
{\ottdrulename{pars\_stmt}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleparsXXstate}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{(}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{empty}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow [  \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Trans} \, x  \ottsym{)} }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{stmt''}  \ottsym{=}  P  \ottsym{(}  x  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  P  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  {\longrightarrow}_{p} [  \ottnt{stmt''}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{pars\_state}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleparsXXempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{(}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{empty}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow [   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)} }%
\ottpremise{ x  = ``\mathit{reject}" }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  P  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  {\longrightarrow}_{p} [   \mathbf{transition}\,  x   ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{pars\_empty}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleparsXXfin}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{(}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{empty}  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow [  \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  p_{ \mathrm{fin} }  \ottsym{)} }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{,}  P  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  {\longrightarrow}_{p} [  \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  p_{ \mathrm{fin} }  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{pars\_fin}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnparsXXred}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ { \mathit{ctx}_\mathit{P} }  \vdash [  \ottnt{stmt}  ]  s  {\longrightarrow}_{p} [  \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  s' $}{\ottcom{parser block semantics}}

\newcommand{\ottdrulearchXXin}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{inp}  \ottsym{=}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{[}  i  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \overline{io}''  \ottsym{,}  \gamma'  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  { f_{ \mathit{in} } }  \ottsym{(}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \gamma  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ i'  =  i  + 1 }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{in} } }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{out} } }  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ] (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{false}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  \gamma  \ottsym{)} ,  { C } ,  \sigma ,   { \mathbf{R} }   ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} [   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ] (  \ottsym{(}  i'  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{false}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}''  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  \gamma'  \ottsym{)} ,  { C } ,  \sigma ,   { \mathbf{R} }   ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{arch\_in}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdrulearchXXout}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{out}  \ottsym{=}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{[}  i  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \overline{io}''  \ottsym{,}  \gamma'  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  { f_{ \mathit{out} } }  \ottsym{(}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  \gamma  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ i'  = 0 }%
}{
 { \mathit{ctx}_\mathit{A} }  \vdash [   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ] (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{false}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  \gamma  \ottsym{)} ,  { C } ,  \sigma ,   { \mathbf{R} }   ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} [   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ] (  \ottsym{(}  i'  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{false}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}''  \ottsym{,}  \gamma'  \ottsym{)} ,  { C } ,  \sigma ,   { \mathbf{R} }   ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{arch\_out}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulearchXXparserXXinit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{parser} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}  P  \ottsym{=}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{(}  f  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ x  = ``\mathit{start}" }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{=}  P  \ottsym{(}  x  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ \forall d ,\, e ,\, i \leqslant n. \, d =  \ottsym{[}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{]}  [i] \, \land \, e =  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  [i] \, \implies  
         ((d \in \{\circ , \downarrow\} \implies \mathrm{is\_const} \, e ) \land (d \in \{\updownarrow , \uparrow\} \implies \mathrm{is\_var} \, e)) }%
\ottpremise{ \forall d,\, e,\, x,\, i \leqslant n . \, x = [x_1 , ... , x_n] [i] \land 
         \, e = [e_1 , ... , e_n] [i] \land 
         \, d = [d_1 , ... , d_n] [i] 
         \implies  \gamma' (x) = 
	   \begin{cases}
	     (\mathrm{lookup_v}( \varepsilon , e), e) & \mathrm{if} \; d \in \{ \uparrow , \updownarrow \} \\
             (e, \bot) & \mathrm{if} \; d \in \{ \downarrow , \circ \}
	   \end{cases} }%
\ottpremise{ { \gamma }_G   \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\varepsilon'  \ottsym{=}   \ottsym{[}   { \gamma }_G   \ottsym{]}  \mathrel{\mathop+}+  \ottsym{[}  \gamma'  \ottsym{]} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{v}  = \mathit{NoError} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{lval}  = \mathit{parseError} }%
\ottpremise{ \varepsilon''  =  \varepsilon'  [  \ottnt{lval}  \longmapsto  \ottnt{v}  ] }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{in} } }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{out} } }  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottkw{pbl\_call} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ] (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{true}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  \gamma  \ottsym{)} ,  { C } ,  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)} ,   { \mathbf{R} }   ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} [  \ottnt{stmt}  ] (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{true}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  \gamma  \ottsym{)} ,  { C } ,  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)} ,   { \mathbf{R} }   ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{arch\_parser\_init}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulearchXXcontrolXXinit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{control} \, \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}  { \mathit{Tb} }  \ottsym{=}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{(}  f  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ \forall d ,\, e ,\, i \leqslant n. \, d =  \ottsym{[}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{]}  [i] \, \land \, e =  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  [i] \, \implies  
         ((d \in \{\circ , \downarrow\} \implies \mathrm{is\_const} \, e ) \land (d \in \{\updownarrow , \uparrow\} \implies \mathrm{is\_var} \, e)) }%
\ottpremise{ \forall d,\, e,\, x,\, i \leqslant n . \, x = [x_1 , ... , x_n] [i] \land 
         \, e = [e_1 , ... , e_n] [i] \land 
         \, d = [d_1 , ... , d_n] [i] 
         \implies  \gamma'' (x) = 
	   \begin{cases}
	     (\mathrm{lookup_v}( \varepsilon , e), e) & \mathrm{if} \; d \in \{ \uparrow , \updownarrow \} \\
             (e, \bot) & \mathrm{if} \; d \in \{ \downarrow , \circ \}
	   \end{cases} }%
\ottpremise{ { \gamma' }_G   \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\varepsilon'  \ottsym{=}   \ottsym{[}   { \gamma' }_G   \ottsym{]}  \mathrel{\mathop+}+  \ottsym{[}  \gamma''  \ottsym{]} }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{in} } }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{out} } }  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottkw{pbl\_call} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ] (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{true}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  \gamma  \ottsym{)} ,  { C } ,  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)} ,   { \mathbf{R} }   ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} [  \ottnt{stmt}  ] (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{true}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  \gamma  \ottsym{)} ,  { C } ,  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)} ,   { \mathbf{R} }   ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{arch\_control\_init}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdrulearchXXparserXXret}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{{ \mathit{ pblock } } \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{[}  i  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{parser} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}  P  \ottsym{=}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{(}  f  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ { \gamma' }_G   \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{[}  \gamma''  \ottsym{]}  = \mathrm{FOLD} (\lambda \, \overline{\varepsilon} \, i . \,
	                  \mathrm{if}   \ottsym{[}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{]}  [i] \in \{ \downarrow , \circ \} \, \mathrm{then} \, \overline{\varepsilon} \\
                          \mathrm{else} \, \overline{\varepsilon} \, [a \longmapsto v] \mathit{where} \; (\mathit{v}, a) = \mathrm{lookup_t}(  \varepsilon  , [x_1 , ... , x_n] [i]) ) (  \ottsym{[}  \gamma  \ottsym{]}  ) [1 ... n] }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{lval}  = \mathit{parseError} }%
\ottpremise{ x  = \mathit{parseError} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{v}  = \mathrm{lookup_v} ( \varepsilon ,  x ) }%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{[}  \gamma'''  \ottsym{]}  =  \ottsym{[}  \gamma''  \ottsym{]}  [  \ottnt{lval}  \longmapsto  \ottnt{v}  ] }%
\ottpremise{ i'  =  i  + 1 }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{in} } }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{out} } }  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ] (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{true}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  \gamma  \ottsym{)} ,  { C } ,  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)} ,  p_{ \mathrm{fin} }  ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} [   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ] (  \ottsym{(}  i'  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{false}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  \gamma'''  \ottsym{)} ,  { C } ,  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{[}   { \gamma' }_G   \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{,}   {\emptyset}_{E}   \ottsym{)} ,   { \mathbf{R} }   ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{arch\_parser\_ret}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdrulearchXXffblockXXexec}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ i'  =  i  + 1 }%
\ottpremise{{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{(}  f  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ \forall d ,\, e ,\, i \leqslant n. \, d =  \ottsym{[}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{]}  [i] \, \land \, e =  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  [i] \, \implies  
         ((d \in \{\circ , \downarrow\} \implies \mathrm{is\_const} \, e ) \land (d \in \{\updownarrow , \uparrow\} \implies \mathrm{is\_var} \, e)) }%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \gamma'  \ottsym{,}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  { \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}  \gamma  \ottsym{,}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{in} } }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{out} } }  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottkw{ffbl\_call} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ] (  \ottsym{(}  i  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{false}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  \gamma  \ottsym{)} ,  { C } ,  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)} ,  t  ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} [   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ] (  \ottsym{(}  i'  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{false}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}  \ottsym{,}  \overline{io}'  \ottsym{,}  \gamma'  \ottsym{)} ,  { C } ,  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)} ,  t'  ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{arch\_ffblock\_exec}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulearchXXpblockXXargs}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{{ \mathit{ pblock } }  \ottsym{=}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{(}  f  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{args\_of\_pbl} \, \ottsym{(}  { \mathit{ pblock } }  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ i = \mathrm{min} \, \{ j . \,\,  \ottsym{[}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{]}  [j]  \in \{\circ , \downarrow\} \wedge \neg ( \mathrm{is\_const} \,  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  [j] ) \} }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{=}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  i'  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{ \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [  \ottnt{e}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{e'}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  t'  \ottsym{)} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  =   ( i'  \mapsto   \ottnt{e'} )  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{in} } }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{out} } }  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottkw{pbl\_call} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ] (  { \mathit{env}_\mathit{A} } ,  { C } ,  \sigma ,  t  ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} [  \ottkw{pbl\_call} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ] (  { \mathit{env}_\mathit{A} } ,  { C }' ,  \sigma' ,  t'  ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{arch\_pblock\_args}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulearchXXffblockXXargs}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{(}  f  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ i = \mathrm{min} \, \{ j . \,\,  \ottsym{[}  d_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  d_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{]}  [j]  \in \{\circ , \downarrow\} \wedge \neg ( \mathrm{is\_const} \,  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  [j] ) \} }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e}  \ottsym{=}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  i'  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{ \mathit{ctx}  \vdash [  \ottnt{e}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }  \ottsym{,}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  t  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{e'}  ]  \ottsym{(}  { C }'  \ottsym{,}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  t'  \ottsym{)} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  =   ( i'  \mapsto   \ottnt{e'} )  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{]}  }%
}{
 \ottsym{(}  \overline{ab}  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{p} }  \ottsym{,}  B_{ \mathit{ff} }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{in} } }  \ottsym{,}  { f_{ \mathit{out} } }  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{Ty}  \ottsym{,}  X  \ottsym{,}  F  \ottsym{)}  \vdash [  \ottkw{ffbl\_call} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ] (  { \mathit{env}_\mathit{A} } ,  { C } ,  \sigma ,  t  ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} [  \ottkw{ffbl\_call} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ] (  { \mathit{env}_\mathit{A} } ,  { C } ,  \sigma' ,  t'  ) }{%
{\ottdrulename{arch\_ffblock\_args}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnarchXXred}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ { \mathit{ctx}_\mathit{A} }  \vdash [  \ottnt{arch\_stmt}  ] (  { \mathit{env}_\mathit{A} } ,  { C } ,  \sigma ,  t  ) {\longrightarrow}_{A} [  \ottnt{arch\_stmt'}  ] (  { \mathit{env}_\mathit{A} }' ,  { C }' ,  \sigma' ,  t'  ) $}{\ottcom{architecture-level semantics}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdrulearchXXffblockXXexec{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulearchXXpblockXXargs{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulearchXXffblockXXargs{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}
